info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 6:21PM EDT until September 08 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL BERTIE...SOUTHEASTERN NORTHAMPTON AND SOUTHWESTERN HERTFORD COUNTIES... At 621 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woodland, or 7 miles north of Aulander, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Bertie, southeastern Northampton and southwestern Hertford Counties, including the following locations... Earleys, Oak Villa, Saint John, Menola, Connaritsa, Millennium, Burden, Proctors Corner, Poor Town, and Brantleys Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
